text: Clan Alarak is a lesser [[Mror clan]], a small tenant family to Clan [[Lanarak|Lanarak and Londurak]]. They possess an unusual incidence of [[sorcerer]]s dating all the way to the [[time of Exile|Mror History]], and seem to be remarkably resistant to the Frenzy and other psychic curses of [[Dyrrn]], making them excellent dungeoneers and guides within the [[Realm Below]].
title: Alarak
